name: Adjustable Equipment
description: Maximize your workout versatility with space-saving customizable weight options in a single compact unit for both dumbbells and kettlebells.

name: Strength Training Gear
description: Essential equipment for building strength including barbells and benches to specialized lifting bars and pull-up bars ideal for home and gym use.

name: Core & Balance Equipment
description: Enhance your stability balance and core strength with versatile tools such as stability balls and resistance bands for a full-body workout.

name: General Fitness Gear
description: Essential gear for every fitness enthusiast includes cushioned mats that offer comfort and support during stretching and yoga as well as floor exercises.
